code:
gantt
    title FrankX Ecosystem - 2025 Project Roadmap
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
    axisFormat %b %Y
    todayMarker stroke-width:3px,stroke:#E24A90,opacity:1

    %% ========================================
    %% ARCANEA PLATFORM
    %% ========================================

    section Arcanea Platform

    Performance Optimization      :arc13, 2025-06-15, 30d
